Queer Auntie Internet Adventure
by Regina Clarkinia

Career Chart

The purpose of this Career Chart is to define your talents, your money-making ability, your career path, and to clarify the area in your life that your career thrives.

Natal Chart

A Natal Chart reveals a lot about your life patterns and trajectory. It helps you to understand how to apply your talents towards your life's purpose. A chart contains your family roots and shows you this life's posibilities.

Tarot

One-hour tarot reading, either in-person or over the phone. Check in with your current life path. Become conscious of messages from your subconscious.
